title: Bandier Men's Wsly Rivington Weekend Tank
features: WSLY is street-wise edge with a purposeful existence. We use organic and recycled materials that feel as good on your skin as they are on the environment. From the recycled labels to the compostable bags, everything is in the pursuit of doing better

Meet the perfect tank. Made from cloud-soft organic cotton, the WSLY Rivington Weekend Tank goes through a special breaking-in process, resulting in fabric that feels like you’ve worn it forever. Once you put it on, you’ll never want to wear anything else
Runs small. We suggest sizing up if you are between sizes. Model is wearing a size small

Our tie dyes are individually tied and dyed by hand, which results in variations of shading and color in every item - no two are exactly alike! It is recommended that this garment be washed separately until no further color is released and that discretion is used when worn with lighter colored apparel
description: WSLY is street-wise edge with a purposeful existence. We use organic and recycled materials that feel as good on your skin as they are on the environment. From the recycled labels to the compostable bags, everything is in the pursuit of doing better.
